Name: Ronard
description:
Ronard is a 53 year old who deals in a banana production business. He is a well-respected member of the community, due to his leadership skills.

Ronard is requesting financial aid so he can improve the standards of his plantation. He will buy fertilizers and mulches to control soil erosion that reduces soil fertility. With that, he will be able to farm on fertile soils and produce better bananas that attract better prices. Thank you funders.
